about_the_game:
Greetings, you wacky riders! As Rude Racers is now finally available in Early Access, we have some more fang-tastic news for you this Halloween! The Gone Haunting DLC for Rude Racers is now available for FREE!

Prepare to face your fears in this spooky new special for Rude Racers. The candles are out, the roads are dark and danger lurks everywhere!

The graveyard shift is on as the racers ride out into the abandoned, eerie streets of the Haunted Village. Pick up the custom Torpedo Demonic SP and power your way to the top of the pack but beware- there will be more tricks than treats!


"The graveyard shift is on as the racers ride out into the abandoned, eerie streets."

The special new zone sets the mood with spooky surprises and poses new challenges as this will be the very first set of night events in Rude Racers! There's craziness galore (as you'd expect from Rude Racers!) with a brand new broom weapon that replaces the bat and custom hats and helmets for some of the riders.
New kid Turbo Tommy is mama's little devil with fancy devil horns while our very own fashionista, Deadly Daisy, is all set to cast a spell on her rivals with a boo-tiful witch-hat! Razor Rick and Electra Lopez have their own share of frightening treats to bring to the party too!

While the sight of some looney pedestrians nonchalantly walking across a busy road is nothing new in Rude Racers, their deadly shenanigans go up a level as they too are in on the action with ridiculous face-paints, masks and even more garbage (and slime!) to throw at you. Forget the ghosts, just beware of these creepy buggers!


"The deadly shenanigans of the looney pedestrians go up a level!"

The Quake Spectre Edition bike is also coming soon with a ghoulishly cool look to deliver a perfect combination of speed and power.

There are plenty more surprises in store and we'll be adding more content to the DLC in the coming days but in the meantime, fire up your bike and prepare to drive fast and fight hard!

That's enough jibber jabber from us for now so go ahead and install this smokin' new DLC for Rude Racers and get ready to be scared silly!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Sierra
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics with 1.5 GB dedicated memory
  • Additional Notes: On older Apple computers, we recommend enabling the "Open in Low Resolution" option from the app's Info settings

movies.name: Rude Racers Halloween Special DLC- Gone Haunting is LIVE on Steam for FREE!

name: Rude Racers Halloween Special : Gone Haunting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 400 (OpenGL 2.1 compatible)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Aspect Ratio 16:9

short_description: It's trick or treat time in Rude Racers with the Halloween special DLC- Gone Haunting! Sprint through the eerie, dark roads of the Haunted Village on the special edition bikes and take a swing at your rivals with the smashing new Broom weapon.
